page.title: 17Population
page.content: Great Bealing population, 310 population level - minute increase during past ten years. Number of households, 108% of households with children, 28% of households pensioners only, 29% Little Bealings population, 490 Population Level - very small increase during past ten years. Number of Households: 163% of household with children, 28% of households pensioners only , 32% Playford Population, 260 population level - very small decrease during past 10 yars number of households, 88% of households with chilren, 30% of households pensioners only, 25% the number of people of Suffolk origin outnumbers the outsiders and there are virtually no ethnic people.
